modules.description: This module computes SWHIDs for content, directories, releases, revisions, and snapshots based on provided object data. It operates on structured types like `directory_entry`, `date`, and object identifiers, using SHA1 hashing and OS-level operations. Concrete use cases include generating persistent identifiers for version-controlled files, directories, and commit metadata in software heritage systems.

This module computes Software Heritage identifiers (SWHIDs) for version-controlled objects by hashing their content and metadata using SHA-1. It supports operations for normalizing and serializing data structures such as directory trees, revisions, and releases before hashing. Concrete use cases include generating persistent identifiers for source code archives, verifying data integrity in version control systems, and supporting archival and citation workflows in software repositories.
